name: Ordered Items To Be Delivered
query:
SELECT
 	`tabSales Order`.`name` as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:100",
 	`tabSales Order`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
 	`tabSales Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.item_name as "Item Name::150",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:100",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.qty as "Qty:Int:60",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty as "Delivered:Int:70",
 	(`tabSales Order Item`.qty - ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty, 0)) as "To Deliver:Int:70",
 	`tabBin`.actual_qty as "Available:Int:70",
 	`tabBin`.projected_qty as "Projected:Int:70",
 	`tabSales Order Item`.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200"
FROM
 	`tabSales Order`, `tabSales Order Item`, `tabBin`
WHERE
 	`tabSales Order Item`.`parent` = `tabSales Order`.`name`
 	AND `tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1
 	AND `tabSales Order`.status != "Stopped"
 	AND ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty,0) < ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.qty,0)
 	AND `tabBin`.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code
 	AND `tabBin`.warehouse = `tabSales Order Item`.warehouse
order by 
	`tabSales Order`.transaction_date asc
